data.prayer: Father, we pray that the county of Anantapur be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Anantapur to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Anantapur, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, help your children in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 44,892 believers in the county of Anantapur the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Anantapur.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.
